abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews movie A Strange Course of Events, directed by Raphael Nadjari.
lead_paragraph: A clerical worker at a hospital in Israel decides, on impulse, to visit his estranged father in Haifa.They haven’t see each other in five years.
snippet: A clerical worker at a hospital in Israel decides, on impulse, to visit his estranged father in Haifa.They haven’t see each other in five years.
